amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language in the bill that requires the State departments of transportation to apply part of a rescission proportionately across all highway programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the proviso pertaining to the Highway Trust Fund account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 217 (Roll no. 691).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Mica.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
